name: Super Hyper Ultra Starlight Warriors Advance
name_original: Super Hyper Ultra Starlight Warriors Advance
description:
Enter the world of Super Hyper Ultra Starlight Warriors and fight endless waves of beasts. Play with your friends as a Knight, a Priestess, a Mage, or a Rock Star, each with individual abilities, strengths, and weaknesses.

New build as of September 9, 2016!

IMPORTANT: Three controllers and three players are required. I plan on integrating some co-player AI, keyboard controls, and networking in a later build of the game.Controls:
  • Left analog: Move
  • Right Bumper or Face Buttons: Jump
  • Right Trigger: Primary ability
  • Left Bumper: Special 1
  • Left Trigger: Special 2

Other Controls

  • Esc: End the game
  • Alt+Enter: Toggle fullscreen
  • Right Bumper: Confirm
  • Left Bumper: Cancel
